meanings.definition: Any of a group of substances that on hydrolysis yield a sugar and one or more other substances.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that glucosides are compounds that break down into sugar and other substances.
meanings.sent2: In nature, plants often contain glucosides that serve various purposes.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel mistook the glucosides for candy and tried to taste them.
meanings.sent4: Her friendship was like glucosides, sweet and complex in its composition.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used a colorful diagram to illustrate the concept of glucosides to the students.
